```{r, echo=FALSE}
require(data.table)
require(ggplot2)
require(cowplot)
```


```{r}
data.dir<-"/home/anne/Masterarbeit/pipeline_difficult/sample_data/biogrid/"
```

```{r}
toy<-data.table()
data.files<-grep("general", dir(data.dir), value = T)
for(d in data.files){ 
  t<-fread(file.path(data.dir, d))
  t$file<-gsub(".tsv", "", gsub("general_", "", d))
  toy<-rbind(toy, t)
}
g1<-ggplot(toy, aes(x=V2))+geom_histogram(bins=100,aes(fill=file),position = "identity", alpha=0.3)+scale_color_brewer(aesthetics = "fill")+ggtitle("P-Value Distribution of Toydata")+xlab("P-Value")+theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

```{r, echo=F}

ggsave(plot=g1,filename="/home/anne/Masterarbeit/thesis/figures/toydata_figures/toydata_pvalue_distribution.pdf")
```
